data.title: Sean Penn Says He's Still In Love With Estranged Wife Leila George: 'I F—ked Up The Marriage'
data.meta_description: Sean Penn is getting candid as he reflected on the ending of his fast times marriage to Leila George. The couple filed for divorce in October 2021, after tying the knot in July 2020, but they dated for four years prior to the marriage.
data.text: Sean Penn is getting candid as he reflected on the ending of his fast times marriage to Leila George. The couple filed for divorce in October 2021, after tying the knot in July 2020, but they dated for four years prior to the marriage. The 61-year-old actor opened up in a recent interview with Hollywood Authentic and shared intimate details of why they split. “I f–ked up the marriage. We were married technically for one year, but for five years, I was a very neglectful guy,” Sean said.
